title: Is God of War Ragnarok Coming to PS4? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.17.20
description:
Go to http://gabi.com/gamesdaily to find out how much Gabi can save you

Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate can be! 

Go to http://hellofresh.com/games90 and use code games90 to get $90 off including free shipping!

Blessing and Imran talk about the next God of War game and discuss whether or not it's making it's way to the PlayStation 4.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:00 - Housekeeping
Right after this episode of KFGD, I’ll be joining Nitro Rifle himself - Andy Cortez, and Nick_Scarpino for some Black Ops Cold War. That’s happening right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Tom Bock & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:29 - Is God of War Ragnarok coming to PlayStation 4? - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:23:25 - Speaking of God of War: Alanah Pearce joins Sony Santa Monica!
00:30:00 - Don’t expect Halo Infinite at The Game Awards - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:36:30 - USgamer staff have been laid off - Brendain Sinclair @ GiBiz
00:39:30 - Cyberpunk 2077 is huge - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:48:20 -  Ad  
00:53:20 - Animal Crossing: New Horizons is getting some big updates - Andrew Webster @ The Verge
00:58:00 - Out today
01:03:12 - Squad Up:The Nano Biologist(Twitter/ e-learning) @DaNanoBiologist
01:04:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary Whitta
Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
